sourcesContent:
export function nightTimeSpeeches(dayNumber:number) {
  return speeches[dayNumber]
}

export function nightTimeLabelTexts(dayNumber:number) {
  return labels[dayNumber]
}

export function nightTimeButtonTexts(dayNumber:number) {
  return buttonTexts[dayNumber]
}

// NIGHT OF DAY 0
const day0Speech1 = '"Mm, ahem, this is a school announcement. It is now 10 p.m. As such, it is officially nighttime. \
Okay then… sweet dreams, everyone! Good night, sleep tight, don\'t let the bed bugs bite…"'
const day0Speech2 = 'Press button below when everybody is asleep'
const day0Speech3 = 'Traitor, wake up. Check to see if there are other traitors among the group. I will give you a few seconds \
to look around. Next, look at the screen. I will reveal to you who the Blackened player is.'
const day0Speech4 = 'U pu pu pu'
const day0Speech5 = 'Traitors - Go back to sleep. \
Blackened - Wake up. Place the bullet card in front of the player you would like to attack. \
On Night 0, the victim will only lose an item card and will not be killed. \
Press the button below when you are done'
const day0Speech6 = 'U pu pu pu. Blackened - Go back to sleep.'
const day0Speeches = [day0Speech1, day0Speech2, day0Speech3, day0Speech4, day0Speech5, day0Speech6]

const day0LabelText1 = 'Night Time is about to begin'
const day0LabelText2 = 'Go to sleep'
const day0LabelText3 = 'Traitors awaken'
const day0LabelText4 = 'Blackened attack'
const day0Labels = [day0LabelText1, day0LabelText2, day0LabelText3, day0LabelText4]

const day0ButtonText1 = 'Click here to start'
const day0ButtonText2 = 'Everyone is asleep'
const day0ButtonText3 = 'Reveal the Blackened!'
const day0ButtonText4 = ''
const day0ButtonText5 = 'I am done'
const day0ButtonText6 = 'Start Night Time sequence'
const day0ButtonTexts = [day0ButtonText1, day0ButtonText2, day0ButtonText3, day0ButtonText4, day0ButtonText5, day0ButtonText6]

// NIGHT OF DAY 1
const day1String1 = '"It is now officially nighttime. Please raise your hand if there is something you’d like to do before going to bed" \
\n\n \
Would anybody like to use a night time card?'
const day1String2 = '"Okay then… sweet dreams, everyone! Good night, sleep tight, don\'t let the bed bugs bite…"'
const day1Speeches3 = 'Person 1 - Resolve your item effect. Person 2 - Resolve your item effect…'
const day1Speeches = [day1String1, day1String2, day1Speeches3]

const day1ButtonText1 = 'Click here to enter Item Card. \n\n \
You only need to enter Item Cards that let you investigate someone\'s role at night'
const day1ButtonTexts = [day1ButtonText1]


const speeches = [day0Speeches, day1Speeches]
const buttonTexts = [day0ButtonTexts, day1ButtonTexts]
const labels = [day0Labels]
